nodes.text: Malinna was a female Human who worked as a gear vendor during the Galactic War between the Galactic Republic and the Sith Empire. During the war, she operated a stall in the Alien Enclave Market of the city Voss-Ka on the planet Voss.
Malinna first appeared in Star Wars: The Old Republic, an MMORPG released by BioWare in 2011. In the game she serves as a Republic and Imperial specialty vendor on the planet Voss.
